column5: it timed out a few times too, at home and now work  anyone else  bradford area  and rogers at home

Same here Terry, I'm on Rogers too and OFC is unbelievably slow today, but all the other websites are very fast.  Strange, but this is the only place I ever have problems with my computer slowing down and have never seen it on any other websites before.
Yup.. its slow for me as well...  Im sure rick will look into it.. hes the IT guy!!
Yep...slow this morning at home....timed out a few times.  Got to work and the same thing.

We were just having some routine maintenance done. Every two weeks we have the guys at IPS do a bunch of load tests and stuff. Usually only takes them an hour to finish. I also have them try and brute force attack the site once a month and since we have a few settings looser here than what is SOP, that takes them longer. If you've ever seen a site destroyed by a hacker you'll know why we go through this. It is a minor inconvenience and gives some people something to talk about.
Everything is back up to normal speed again on my end, so thanks to whoever is responsible
Thanks Rick, we were posting at the same time.
are you still testing Rick its slow and timed out at 3:10 for me on comcast cable in the states.  Art
